description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.
Enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
Enhances the accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
Enhances the range of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}% and hold duration by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.
